content.body: Should we be asking the various Twitter clones to weigh in on our `source` bike shed?
content.formatted_body: Should we be asking the various Twitter clones to weigh in on our source bike shed?

content.body: Also, how is https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/9486 going? Domenic's suggestions make sense to me; are we going to make a new version that adopts those suggestions?
